text:
Situation:
- catalina 4.0.4 is installed as service;
- in server.xml chenged port number from "8080" to "80";
- restarted service, and catalina do not respond to request via 8080 or 80 
ports;

Solutions:
1. As setted back port number from "80" to "8080" and restared service, 
catalina responded properly, but to "8080" port.
2. As setted port number to "80" and _REBOOTED_ PC, catalina started responding 
properly to "80" port.

I haven't noticed this problem if catalina starts as application.

~nn
creator: nerijusn@srb-intl.com
remm@apache.org
text:
Please check you didn't have another webserver running as a service or 
standalone application on port 80 (like IIS or Apache). I use Tomcat as a 
service on port 80 with Win2k, and I would have noticed the problem.

You can check the logs to read about the problems (logs/stdout.log and 
logs/stderr.log).
